projects.title: Horns, A Gallery
projects.description: My first foray into React Bootstrap, this application uses Bootstrap Cards to display each horned beast. It functions on the surface like a Facebook or Pinterest of sorts, because the user can click a button to 'Fave' the beast which add's to its overall <3 count, and if the user clicks the beast's image then it will come into the foreground focus as a modal on the page.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: I was tasked with setting up a site for a fictional business that sells Salmon Cookies at five different stores across the globe. The main page has internal and external page navigation, and incorporates a fair amount of CSS. The sales page utilizes Javascript to calculate and populate the cookies per hour sold (using random inputs) and each location, and even allows users to add inputs for new locations.
